name: Truck Battle Hero
description:
Let's play Adventure addictive game.

Truck hero go to at home and on the road have a lot of zombies. You job to reach home and kill the all zombies. There are so many different east to hard levels. Collect the coins and upgrade your truck speed, booster, Resistance, Torque and Accelerate. And completed every level one by one.

Features:
=======
- Addicting game play.
- Easy to hard levels.
- Upgrade your truck.
- Ultimate Music.
- More levels are coming soon.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for Battle Hero? Download Now.....

Don't forget review us!
